front.title: Applications and Media Information (AMI) Extension to the Presence Information Data Format

abstract.t: The Presence Information Data Format (PIDF) defines a basic formatfor representing presence information for a presentity. TheApplication and Media Information (AMI) format described here is anextension that adds optional elements to the Presence InformationData Format (PIDF), describing what music a presentity is listeningto, what video it is watching, or what game it is playing.
